name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Fable: Create step-by-step interactive demos and guides in 5 minutes.

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Capture your product in minutes to build interactive guides and demos with Fable.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Capture your product application in minutes to build interactive guides and demos with Fable. Here's how it works:

- Turn on the Chrome extension and click through any product
- Fable captures the rest and auto-stitches the guide/ demo for you
- Customize the guides with CTAs, editing options, branding elements, and many more
- Embed these fables or share them as a URL depending on your use case

Fable has use cases across the board. This is how some teams are using Fable today:

- Marketing teams to increase conversions
- Sales teams to close more deals
- Partnerships teams to empower partners
- Customer Success teams to onboard and train customers
- Learning & Development teams to supercharge onboarding and training

Fable is purpose-built for teams of all sizes. With our self-serve documentation and simple pricing, you can get started today and create your first interactive guide/ demo in less than 5 minutes.
